Label: Default Version
description: The default version to use when accessing the application

Label: Welcome Message
description: Custom message displayed on the welcome screen

Label: Number of Cards Per Person
description: Number of bingo cards each player receives

Label: Time
description: The time when the bingo game starts, and optionally ends

Label: Bingo Word
description: Custom word displayed on the welcome screen for what a person should call out at bingo

Label: Pattern Rotation Interval (seconds)
description: Time in seconds between pattern rotations in the game preview

Label: Game Display Order
description: Order in which games are displayed in the game selection

Label: Show Last Number Played
description: Display the last number played on the bingo board

Label: Show Number History Section
description: Display the number history section on the bingo board

Label: Sound Effects
description: Enable sound effects for game events

Label: B Letter Card Color
description: Background color for the B letter cards

Label: I Letter Card Color
description: Background color for the I letter cards

Label: N Letter Card Color
description: Background color for the N letter cards

Label: G Letter Card Color
description: Background color for the G letter cards

Label: O Letter Card Color
description: Background color for the O letter cards

Label: Board Highlight Color
description: Background color for highlighted/called numbers on the bingo board

Label: Bingo Server URL
description: URL of the bingo server for multiplayer games

Label: Bingo Server Auth Token
description: Token for authenticating with the bingo server

Label: Connection Retry Interval (seconds)
description: How often to retry server connections (auto-reconnect every 10 seconds)

Label: Flash Message Timeout (seconds)
description: How long flash messages are displayed before automatically closing

Label: Flash Message Background Color
description: Background color for the flash message rectangle

Label: Flash Message Border Color
description: Border color for the flash message rectangle

Label: Flash Message Unlit Color
description: Unlit color for the flashing border animation

Label: Flash Message Lit Color
description: Lit color for the flashing border animation

Label: Developer Mode
description: Enable developer features including sample data generation and debugging tools
